text: Futhi uMvelinqangi wenza isibonelo samadoda amabili oyedwa kubona bobabili uyisimungulu akanamandla okwenza okuthize futhi yena ungumthwalo kumnikazi wakhe noma ngabe umthuma kuphi akabuyi nalutho oluhle, ngakube yena uyalingana yini kanye nalowo ophoqa ngobulungiswa futhi yena esendleleni eqondile na
